title: Evaluation of Machine Learning Techniques for Green Energy Prediction
abstract: We evaluate the following Machine Learning techniques for Green Energy (Wind, Solar) Prediction: Bayesian Inference, Neural Networks, Support Vector Machines, Clustering techniques (PCA). Our objective is to predict green energy using weather forecasts, predict deviations from forecast green energy, find correlation amongst different weather parameters and green energy availability, recover lost or missing energy (/ weather) data. We use historical weather data and weather forecasts for the same.
